snippet: With a mix of modern and West African dance, Ronald K. Brown and his dance company, Evidence, use the music of Nina Simone and Fela Anikulapo Kuti to pay tribute to the fortitude of activists.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by Ronald K Brown/Evidence dance company at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: With a mix of modern and West African dance, Ronald K. Brown and his dance company, Evidence, use the music of Nina Simone and Fela Anikulapo Kuti to pay tribute to the fortitude of activists.

headline.seo: Ronald K. Brown/Evidence at the Joyce
